Malaysian: zsmibu pejabat "zsmibu" also means "mother" or "ma'am" in both languages

Indonesian: idkerudung, idjilbab though these words have different meanings
idjamu often understood as traditional potion made from rhizomes, also means guest" ("idtamu") and "treat the guest" ("idmenjamu")
idrumah sakit influenced by Dutch nlziekenhuis (house of the sick") – This term is still used in Brunei
column5: "hospital" has replaced the term completely since the 1960s"

Indonesian: idHungaria, idHongaria substandard, influenced by Dutch nlHongarije
